akn:section.akn:heading: Advisory Committee on Heritable Disorders in Newborns and Children

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment The Secretary shall establish an advisory committee to be known as the “Advisory Committee on Heritable Disorders in Newborns and Children” (referred to in this section as the “Advisory Committee”).
